title: Game not loding
body: Hello everyone, I'm a silver 3 League of Legends player here. So, recently I've noticed that in every game I play, right after champion select, my game would sit at the champion select screen. This has caused me to lose games, and have had many punishments because of this. Can anyone help? I'd rather not get banned on an account for something I have no idea of.

replies.body: When your transition from champion select to the game, your network has to establish a connection to the game server.  I suggest going over each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up and prevent it from happening in the future.  Playing without further interruptions will be the best way to recover from any penalties, and not something we can remove.  Let me know if you have any questions!
